title: Communication Strategies for Online Blended Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and basic online learning tool usage skills
context.additional_context: Requires a balance of synchronous/asynchronous communication, as learners are unfamiliar with real-time interaction despite having digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can write at least three reflective feedbacks on math problem-solving processes and perform peer evaluations in asynchronous discussion boards by week 4
Learners can verify their understanding by asking at least two real-time questions during weekly live sessions after listening to math concept explanations
Learners can submit math learning assignments with over 90% completion rates using synchronous/asynchronous communication tools in blended learning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
